sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"坚持"之意。
means: insist ： 通常用于对意见、主张等的坚持。
persist ： 用于褒义指坚持继续做某事，但更常用于贬义，指不听劝告，顽固坚持。
persevere ： 含褒义，强调坚持不懈的努力。
adhere与to连用，指坚持意见、计划或承诺等，含坚持不懈之意。
cling和to连用，指对信仰、意见、习惯等的坚持。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"持续"之意。
means: persist ： 强调超过了指定的或正常的时间。
last ： 着重存在的时间相当长，超过正常的或所期望的时间。
endure与last同义，但还指经受住，有能耐忍受而并不受损。
continue ： 多指过程，强调持续而无终止，常含不间断之意。

sentence.Network_en: If the symptoms persist, it is important to go to your doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果这些症状持续存在，一定要去看医生。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Straw issued a stern warning to those who persist in violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯特劳先生向那些坚持进行暴力活动的人发出了严正警告。

sentence.Network_en: Why does Britain persist in running down its defence forces?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么英国要坚持消减其军事防御力量？

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin persistere, from per- 'through, steadfastly' + sistere 'to stand'

entry.def: If something undesirable persists, it continues to exist.

example.ex: Contact your doctor if the cough persists...
example.tran: 如果还是咳嗽就去看医生。

example.ex: These problems persisted for much of the decade.
example.tran: 这些问题在那10年的大部分时间里一直存在。

entry.def: If you persist in doing something, you continue to do it, even though it is difficult or other people are against it.

example.ex: Why does Britain persist in running down its defence forces?...
example.tran: 为什么英国要坚持消减其军事防御力量？

example.ex: He urged the United States to persist with its efforts to bring about peace...
example.tran: 他敦促美国继续进行和平斡旋。

sentences.sentence: "he persisted to call me every night"
"The child persisted and kept asking questions"
"The hostility remained long after they made up"

auth_sentence.content: If symptoms persist, corticosteroid therapy may be recommended.

auth_sentence.content: Why do you persist in trying to delude people?

auth_sentence.content: Thus modifications tend to reduce if difficult conditions persist.

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的

per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及
per假,坏+petr石+ate表动词→像石头一样顽固的做坏事→专横,做坏事
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的

resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]

insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
in加强+sist站立→坚定地站立
per始终+sist站→站到最后→坚持
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

Sentence.sentence: And society expects—and needs—parents to persist in their roles for 18 years, or longer if needed.
Cheryl Kaiser holds that people should be constantly reminded that racial inequality still persists in American society.
racial inequality still persists in American society

sentences.en: On the tops of very high mountains snow persists throughout the year.
sentences.cn: 高山顶上, 积雪终年不化。

sentences.en: The bad weather will persist all over the country.
sentences.cn: 这种坏天气将在全国各地持续下去。

sentences.en: His strength of will enabled him to persist.
sentences.cn: 他的意志力使他能坚持下去。

sentences.en: He persisted that he (should) walk there.
He persisted that he did the work alone.
sentences.cn: 他坚持他一个人做那件事。

sentences.en: She persisted that she was strong enough to go back to work.
sentences.cn: 她反复地说她身体已经好了, 可以去上班了。

sentences.en: They persisted in going there in spite of the bad weather.
sentences.cn: 尽管天气很坏, 他们还是坚持去那里。

sentences.en: She persisted in singing although I asked her not to.
sentences.cn: 尽管我叫她别唱歌, 她还是坚持要唱。

sentences.en: Most of them persist in setting strict demands on themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们大多数人坚持严格要求自己。

jushi.chinese: 这种坏天气将在全国各地持续下去。

jushi.english: His strength of will enabled him to persist.
jushi.chinese: 他的意志力使他能坚持下去。
